text: Debug the following program. [3] REM to print 5 records from data file HOSPITAL.TXT​ OPEN "HOSPITAL.TXT" FOR APPEND AS #5​ FOR REP = 1 TO 5​ INPUT #3, PN$,AD$,G$,A​ DISPLAY PN$,AD$,A, G$​ NEXT REP​ FINISH #5​ END
norm: debug the following program. [3] rem to print 5 records from data file hospital.txt​ open "hospital.txt" for append as #5​ for rep = 1 to 5​ input #3, pn$,ad$,g$,a​ display pn$,ad$,a, g$​ next rep​ finish #5​ end

text: Read the following program and answer the given questions. [2] DECLARE SUB AA (N$)​ CLS​ W$= "CYBERCRIME"​ CALL AA(W$)​ END SUB AA (N$)​ R= LEN(N$)\2​ E$=RIGHT$(N$,R) + LEFT$(N$,R)​ PRINT E$​ END SUB Questions:
norm: read the following program and answer the given questions. [2] declare sub aa (n$)​ cls​ w$= "cybercrime"​ call aa(w$)​ end sub aa (n$)​ r= len(n$)\2​ e$=right$(n$,r) + left$(n$,r)​ print e$​ end sub questions:
